They won't do a night release. If you are going to do something big, something that might crash servers, you want to do it in the morning while you still have lots of 9-to-5 time left before the end of the day. That's also the time when more of your customers are at work/school. Anything past say 2pm will probably mean a push until the next day.

Keep eyes all over the internets. Delay announcements have in the past have appeared in very strange places.
